net.semanticmetadata.lire.imageanalysis.mpeg7

Class EdgeHistogramImplementation

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.semanticmetadata.lire.imageanalysis.mpeg7.EdgeHistogramImplementation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EdgeHistogram

    public class EdgeHistogramImplementation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the EdgeHistogram descriptor from the MPEG-7 standard.

    This file is part of the Caliph and Emir project: http://www.SemanticMetadata.net
    Date: 31.01.2006
    Time: 23:07:39

    Author:
    Mathias Lux, mathias@juggle.at

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int BIN_COUNT 
      protected int[] edgeHistogram
      The actual edge histogram.

      Constructor and Description
      EdgeHistogramImplementation()
      Allocates a new EdgeHistogramDescriptor
      EdgeHistogramImplementation(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
      Allocates a new EdgeHistogramDescriptor so that it represents the media located in the file.
      EdgeHistogramImplementation(java.lang.String descriptor) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static float calculateDistance(int[] edgeHistogramA, int[] edgeHistogramB)
      Calculates the distance between two images taking the edge edgeHistogram into account. take 480 as soft upper border, 0 is hard lower border because there are 80 bins <= 7.
      void extract(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image) 
      void extractFeature()
      extractFeature() takes all the information about the types of edge, that have been found in the sub-images and applies the methods getFirstBlockAVG(int i,int j) through getFourthBlockAVG(int i, int j) on the whole image. returns Local_Edge_Histogram returns the 80 bins

      Gets the Bins of the array.

      Sets the descriptor value from a String.
      void setThreshold()

    • Method Detail

      • extract

        public void extract(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)

      • setBinCounts

        public void setBinCounts(int pos,
                int[] value)
                  throws java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
        Responsible for setting the Bin Counts in view of the position of the bins.
        Parameters:
        pos - position of the bins
        value - value of the bin
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - is necessary, since the bins are stored in an array

      • getBinCounts

        public int getBinCounts()
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets the Bins of the array.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - indicates conditions that a reasonable application might want to catch.

      • setThreshold

        public void setThreshold()
        If the maximum of the five edge strengths is greater than a threshold, then the image block is considered to have the corresponding edge in it. Otherwise, the image block contains no edge. The default value is 11.

      • getThreshold

        public int getThreshold()

      • makeGreyLevel

        public void makeGreyLevel()
        The width and height of the media is taken to convert the RGB values into luminance values. returns returns the grey_level of the pixel

      • extractFeature

        public void extractFeature()
        extractFeature() takes all the information about the types of edge, that have been found in the sub-images and applies the methods getFirstBlockAVG(int i,int j) through getFourthBlockAVG(int i, int j) on the whole image. returns Local_Edge_Histogram returns the 80 bins

      • setEdgeHistogram

        public int[] setEdgeHistogram()
        In the setEdgeHistogram() method the value for each edgeHistogram bin are quantized by quantization tables. Five quantisation tables for five different edge types are existing.
        Returns:
        returns 80 bins.

      • calculateDistance

        public static float calculateDistance(int[] edgeHistogramA,
                      int[] edgeHistogramB)
        Calculates the distance between two images taking the edge edgeHistogram into account. take 480 as soft upper border, 0 is hard lower border because there are 80 bins <= 7.
        Parameters:
        edgeHistogramA - defines the first point
        edgeHistogramB - defines the second point
        Returns:
        the distance from [0, 480]

      • getDistance

        public float getDistance(LireFeature descriptor)
        Compares one descriptor to another.
        Parameters:
        descriptor -
        Returns:
        the distance from [0,infinite) or -1 if descriptor type does not match

      • getStringRepresentation

        public java.lang.String getStringRepresentation()
        Creates a String representation from the descriptor.
        Returns:
        the descriptor as String.

      • setStringRepresentation

        public void setStringRepresentation(java.lang.String descriptor)
        Sets the descriptor value from a String.
        Parameters:
        descriptor - the descriptor as String.
